markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Water Nagaji](/Feats.aspx?ID=3986) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Nagaji" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=359" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 49</row>

</column>

---

Much like a [water naga](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=75), you've formed a connection to a sacred or pristine body of water, either as a home or a place to protect. You gain the [Breath Control](/Feats.aspx?ID=763) general feat as a bonus feat and a swim Speed of 10 feet.

<title level="2">Water Nagaji leads to...</title>
[Serpentine Swimmer](/Feats.aspx?ID=3994)
name: Water Nagaji
